title: Rubio defends UFO film remarks
description: Secretary of State Marco Rubio is standing by statements he made several years ago, questioning whether unidentified flying objects may be otherworldly visitors.

title: Trump Signals Potential Disclosures on 3I/ATLAS Files and UAP Records
description: President Donald Trump may soon release classified '3i/ATLAS' files and UAP (Unidentified Aerial Phenomena) records, according to online claims this week.

title: Does alien-crazed Tampico, home of the Martian Fest, have a UFO museum in its future?
description: With enthusiasm so strong that credible evidence is beside the point, the growing UFO craze is turning into a tourism bonanza, especially in the Gulf of Mexico port of Tampico.The post Does alien-crazed Tampico, home of the Martian Fest, have a UFO museum in its future? appeared first on Mexico News Daily

title: UFO clues emerge in decades-old images showing strange bursts over nuclear testing sites: report
description: New research validates UAP phenomenon using 70-year-old astronomical photos, showing connections between nuclear weapons testing and UFO activity.
